text: @WhiteHouse TRUMP the TRAMP is on his way out  come November this Pathetic incompetent low life will not be reelected he has ignored the Constitution and broke laws daily also ruined America everywhere covid19. Debt. Economy. Jobs.all ruined a FAILURE AND DISGRACE AND ALL ROUND COWARD
